articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: NVIDIA, AMD may soon start selling new AI chips in China to comply with US restrictions - TechCrunch
articles.description: NVIDIA and AMD will soon begin selling new GPUs made for AI workloads in China to comply with US chip export restrictions.
articles.content: To comply with the U.S.’ restrictions on exporting advanced semiconductor technology to China, chipmakers NVIDIA and AMD will soon begin selling new GPUs made for AI workloads in China, Taiwanese tec… [+966 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: China extends its reach into the Solar System with launch of asteroid mission - Ars Technica
articles.description: Tianwen-2 will first return samples from an asteroid, then explore a mysterious comet-like object.

articles.author: Rachel Roubein, Lena H. Sun
articles.title: HHS cancels funding for Moderna to develop vaccines to combat bird flu - The Washington Post
articles.description: The department cited Moderna’s use of the messenger RNA technology, which it said “remains under-tested,” for the cancellation of the funding.
articles.content: The Department of Health and Human Services is pulling millions of dollars it had committed to give Moderna to aid the effort to develop a vaccine to combat the bird flu, the company announced Wednes… [+2642 chars]

articles.title: Samsung drops Android 16 beta for Galaxy S25 with more AI you probably don’t want - Ars Technica
